prompts.phrase: Let me know if you need anything!
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of A male office worker looking friendly and supportive while speaking to a colleague.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No exaggerated smiling, no unrealistic props, no unrelated office elements.

prompts.phrase: I think we're on the same page.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of Two male colleagues sitting across from each other in an office meeting room.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No shaking hands, no excessive paperwork, no unrelated distractions.

prompts.phrase: That sounds like a great idea!
prompts.when_to_use: Reacting positively to a colleague's suggestion.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of An office setting where a male person is speaking enthusiastically and another is nodding in agreement.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No exaggerated expressions, no physical gestures like high-fives, no cluttered desks.

prompts.when_to_use: Ensuring ongoing communication about a task or project.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of Two office male workers discussing something in the office kitchen.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No whiteboards, no visible emails or messages, no unnecessary props.

prompts.when_to_use: Assuring a colleague that you will handle a task.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of A male office worker confidently speaking to another, showing responsibility.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No exaggerated facial expressions, no phones, no excessive paperwork.

prompts.phrase: Could we clarify this part a bit more?
prompts.when_to_use: Asking for more details or explanation about a task.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of A male office worker pointing at a document
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No large whiteboards, no irrelevant objects, no excessive writing.

prompts.phrase: I'll get back to you on that.
prompts.when_to_use: Promising to provide an answer or update later.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of A professional setting where a male worker is talking on the phone.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No exaggerated gestures, no phones, no unrelated distractions.

prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of An office setting where a male person is clapping his hands.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No exaggerated cheering, no unnecessary clutter, no large groups.

prompts.when_to_use: Suggesting a fair division of tasks between colleagues.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of Two male colleagues discussing and looking organized.
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No overly complex diagrams, no unrelated props, no group meetings.

prompts.when_to_use: Acknowledging a colleague's information or progress report.
prompts.prompt: single scene, full-frame composition of A happy male worker in a professional office setting
prompts.negative_prompt: multi-panel, comic strip, split sections, triptych, multiple scenes, No unnecessary background elements, no phones, no exaggerated smiling.
